mapper.insert: insert into member( id, password, nickname, email ) values ( #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email} )
mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id=#{id}
select id, password, nickname, email, imageurl from member where id=#{id}
select count(nickname) from member where nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, IMAGEURL = #{IMAGEURL}, ORIGINALIMAGEURL = #{ORIGINALIMAGEURL} where id = #{id}
